Other less common causes include nerve damage, cysts such as Tarlov cysts, obesity, and a bursitis like condition that can arise in slim patients who have little buttocks fat padding.",GARD,Coccygodynia
What are the treatments for Coccygodynia ?,"What treatment is available for coccygodynia? Treatment for coccygodynia generally falls into conservative management or surgical intervention
